rules_text: When Demetra enters, create Fate's Design, a 0/0 legendary artifact creature token that's all colors with “This creature's power and toughness are equal to the highest loyalty among Demetra planeswalkers you control.”
flavor_text: [i] Choose up to one target creature. Until your next turn, all damage that would be dealt to you or a planeswalker you control is dealt to that creature instead.[/i]
special_text:
Once each turn, whenever a nonmana ability of a permanent you control triggers or is activated, you may create Fate's Design, a legendary artifact token with “At the beginning of your end step, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.” 
[+2]: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
[-3]: Create two 1/1 colorless Puppet creature tokens.
[-8]: Exile target card with mana value 7 or less from a graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
